long_description: The Kuhl Parachute Jak has all the urban character you demand and all the technical features you'll be thankful for! This lightweight jacket offers complete waterproof, breathable protection. Made from unlined waterproof, breathable nylon fabric; all seams are sealed to offer complete protection. Kuhl Parachute Jak has a water-resistant front zipper and a hood with a drawcord adjustment. Elastic-bound cuffs; drawcord hem. Includes a stuff sack.
short_description: The Kuhl Parachute Jak has all the urban character you demand and all the technical features you'll be thankful for! This lightweight jacket offers complete waterproof, breathable protection.
